name: Noel Vermillion
title: The Dual-Wielding Sharpshooter
subtitle: A skilled gunslinger with unmatched precision
lore: A highly skilled operative known for her exceptional marksmanship and dual-wielding abilities. Noel Vermillion combines rapid-fire techniques with tactical positioning to dominate the battlefield. Her mastery over her twin revolvers and ability to execute complex maneuvers while maintaining pinpoint accuracy makes her a formidable force in any combat situation.

P.name: Bullet Bomb
P.description: Every second autoattack on the same target blows up around the damaged enemy dealing [30/70/120/165/200 + (7%AD)] to other nearby enemies.

Q.name: Revolver Barrage
Q.description: Noel fires a series of rapid shots in a small cone in front of her, dealing [30-200 + 7% AD] physical damage to all enemies hit.

W.name: Reload and Ready
W.description: Noel roots herself for [1] second restoring [40%] missing mana and gaining [0.4/0.4/0.6/0.8/1] AS for [2] seconds.

E.name: Flash Guard
E.description: Noel quickly dashes to a target location, gaining a shield that absorbs [160%/180%/190%/205%/225% AD] damage for [2.5] seconds. Hitting the same enemy with two autoattacks within [0.5] second sets the cooldown of this ability to [3s]. Damage scaling 45% AD â†’ 40% AD.

R.name: Zero Gun: Fenrir
R.description: Noel starts spinning around for [3] seconds, dealing [200/500/810] damage with her guns to all characters near her every second. If the target is killed by Zero Gun: Fenrir, its cooldown is reduced by [15 seconds]. Noel heals for [15% of the damage dealt] during this ability.

1.name: Precision Shots
1.description: Quest: Revolver Barrage's damage is increased by 1% for the entire match for each enemy hit during the game.

1.name: High-Caliber Rounds
1.description: Quest: Bullet Bomb radius is increased by 25%.

1.name: Quickstep
1.description: Quest: Flash Guard grants an additional [+35] movement speed for [1] second after the dash.

5.name: Rapid Reload
5.description: Reload and Ready doesn't root Noel.

5.name: Healing Reduction
5.description: Noel's passive damage now reduces the enemy healing received by [20%] for [2s].

5.name: Focused Fire
5.description: Each autoattack to the same target increases the damage to that target by [+5%AD] for [3s] or until Noel doesn't attack it.

10.name: Powerful Bullet Storm
10.description: Zero Gun: Fenrir deals bonus [+4% MAXHP] damage to each enemy hit every second.

10.name: Slowing Spinning
10.description: Zero Gun: Fenrir now slows enemies by [30%] while the spinning lasts

15.name: Berserk Mode
15.description: For [10] seconds, Noel becomes immune to slowing effects (40s cooldown).

15.name: Bulletproof
15.description: Flash Guard's shield amount is increased by [+250].

20.name: Explosive Impact
20.description: Noel's passive now deals [85% AD] damage.

20.name: Relentless Assault
20.description: Reload and Ready restores Noel's health equal to 40% of her maximum health.

20.name: Piercing Shots
20.description: Revolver Barrage has larger range and width.

strengths: Powerful area control with Zero Gun: Fenrir
weaknesses: Vulnerable when abilities are on cooldown
Needs time to scale with items and levels
